original_title: French President invites RW to address high-level panel discussion
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe is to address a high-level panel discussion at the Global Leaders' Summit for a New Global Financing Pact scheduled to take place in Paris on June 22 and 23, 2023, the President's Media Division (PMD) said.
The President is to attend the summit following an invitation by President Emmanuel Macron of the French Republic.
